name: Fractured Christmas Carols Quiz | Word Play | 20 Questions

questions.correct: The Little Drummer Boy
questions.explanation:
The Little Drummer Boy.

	Come, they told me, pa-rum-pa-pum-pum. The new-born king to see, pa-rum-pa-pum-pum....

questions.correct: Rudolf the Red-Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nosed Reindeer
questions.explanation:
Rudolf the Red-Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nosed Reindeer.

	Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer had a very shiny nose. And if you ever saw it, you would even say it glows! All of the other reindeer....

questions.correct: Oh Little Town of Bethlehem & O Little Town of Bethlehem
questions.explanation:
Oh Little Town of Bethlehem & O Little Town of Bethlehem.

	Oh little town of Bethlehem, how still we see thee lie....

questions.text: Silas knife (There's a freebie for you.)
questions.correct: Silent Night
questions.explanation:
Silent Night.

	Silent night, holy night. All is calm. All is bright. Round yon virgin mother and child. Holy infant so tender and mild. Sleep in heavenly peeeeee-eace, slee-eep in heavenly peace!

questions.text: Wintry keen shove hoary rent tar
questions.correct: We Three Kings & We Three Kings of Orient Are
questions.explanation:
We Three Kings & We Three Kings of Orient Are.

	We three kings of Orient are. Bearing gifts we traverse afar. Field and fountain, moor and mow-ow-tain, following yonder star! Oh, oh....

questions.correct: Deck the Halls & Deck the Halls with Boughs of Holly & Deck the Hall
questions.explanation:
Deck the Halls & Deck the Halls with Boughs of Holly & Deck the Hall.

	Deck the halls with boughs of holly (fa la la etc.).... 'Tis the season to be jolly....Don we now our gay apparel....Toll the ancient Yuletide carol! Fa-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la!

questions.correct: Feliz Navidad
questions.explanation:
Feliz Navidad.

	Feliz Navidad, Feliz Navidad, Feliz Navidad, prospero ano y felicidad....I want to wish you a Merry Christmas....Pretty song!

questions.correct: Oh Tannenbaum & O Tannenbaum & Oh Tanenbaum & O Tanenbaum
questions.explanation:
Oh Tannenbaum & O Tannenbaum & Oh Tanenbaum & O Tanenbaum.

	O tannenbaum, O tannenbaum, how evergreen your branches!

questions.text: Mime scheming oven wide grist miss
questions.correct: White Christmas & White Xmas & I'm Dreaming of a White Christmas & I'm Dreaming of a White Xmas
questions.explanation:
White Christmas & White Xmas & I'm Dreaming of a White Christmas & I'm Dreaming of a White Xmas.

	I'm dreaming of a white Christmas just like the ones I used to know. Where the snowflakes glisten and children listen to hear sleighbells in the snow, oh.... (I love this movie. It has another great song, 'Sisters.')

questions.correct: The First Noel & The First Nowell
questions.explanation:
The First Noel & The First Nowell.

	The-ah fir-irst No-oh-el the angels did say was to certain poor shepherds in fields where they lay....

questions.correct: Angels We Have Heard on High
questions.explanation:
Angels We Have Heard on High.

	Angels we have heard on high, sweetly singing o'er the plain....Oh oh oh oh (15 oh's altogether) Gloria in excelsis Deo!

questions.correct: Jingle Bell Rock
questions.explanation:
Jingle Bell Rock.

	Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock!

questions.correct: Frosty the Snowman
questions.explanation:
Frosty the Snowman.

	Frosty the Snowman was a jolly, happy soul with a corncob pipe and a button nose and two eyes made of coal!

questions.text: Heave ewer salver miry beetle crass mist
questions.correct: Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas & Have Yourself a Merry Little Xmas
questions.explanation:
Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas & Have Yourself a Merry Little Xmas.

	...let your hearts be light. From now on your troubles will be out of sight....

questions.correct: good king Wenceslaus&Good King Wenceslas & Good King Wencelaus & Good King Winceslaus
questions.explanation:
good king Wenceslaus&Good King Wenceslas & Good King Wencelaus & Good King Winceslaus.

	Good King Wenceslas looked out on the feast of Stephen. When the snow lay round about, deep and crisp and even....

questions.correct: Have a Holly Jolly Christmas & Have a Holly Jolly Xmas
questions.explanation:
Have a Holly Jolly Christmas & Have a Holly Jolly Xmas.

	....It's the best time of the year. I don't know if there'll be snow, but have a cup of cheer.

questions.correct: Away in a Manger & Away in the Manger
questions.explanation:
Away in a Manger & Away in the Manger.

	...no crib for his bed, the little Lord Jesus lay down his sweet head....

questions.text: Chaste gnats resting autumn oven fryer
questions.correct: Chestnuts Roasting on an Open Fire
questions.explanation:
Chestnuts Roasting on an Open Fire.

	...Jack Frost nipping at your nose.... Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow will find it hard to sleep tonight.... This carol is actually titled 'The Christmas Song.'

questions.correct: Santa Claus is Coming to Town
questions.explanation:
Santa Claus is Coming to Town.

	You better watch out, you better not cry, you better not pout, I'm telling you why: Santa Claus is comin' to town!

questions.correct: Joy to the World
questions.explanation:
Joy to the World.

	...the Lord is come! Let Earth receive her King. Let every heart prepare Him room. And Heav'n and Nature sing....
